text: I'm inclined to pass based on Lindsey's email. They're firing Charles through us
Lindsay has been trying to cut him out and I am going to re-emphasize to him we want nothing to do with that scenario.

talked to Charles, he’s going to check w/ EcoTrust on getting out of the contract, and will email Lindsay and cc me for future conversations. We’re planning on letting Rare know we’re not interested in any sort of splitting of Charles’ project directly to us. I’ll carry the conversation forward from here. Charles apologized, and I emphasized that he has no need to - that Rare is being a bit shady and we want nothing to do with that.
